mapper.select: SELECT t1.listentimes hot FROM listentimes t1, qqsonginfos t2 where t1.time>='2014-12-09 00:00:00' and '2014-12-10 00:00:00'>t1.time and t1.id=t2.id and t1.id = #{songid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY t1.time
SELECT t1.id, t2.sname name, t1.listentimes hot FROM listentimes t1, qqsonginfos t2 where t1.time>='2014-12-11 11:00:00' and '2014-12-11 12:00:00'>t1.time and t1.id=t2.id order by t1.listentimes desc

SELECT t1.id, t2.singer, t2.sname song, t1.listentimes hot FROM listentimes t1, qqsonginfos t2 where t1.time>='2014-12-11 11:00:00' and '2014-12-11 12:00:00'>t1.time and t1.id=t2.id order by t1.listentimes desc;
select t.id, t.sname name, t.rsname rsongs from relatedsong t;
select t.S_PROVNAME from dict_province t where t.S_PROVNAME!='国外';
select t.location, t.count from reviewcity t;

select t.id,t2.sname song,t2.singer,t.reviewer,t.location,t.content,t.time date from review t , qqsonginfos t2 where t2.mid=t.mid and t.mid='004SXM193wMYC1'
